mapper.insert: insert into j_post(postNum, postTitle, postContent, postHit, postRegdate, postUpdatedate, boardNum, userNum) values(#{postNum},#{postTitle},#{postContent},0,sysdate(),sysdate(),#{boardNum},#{userNum})
mapper.update: update j_post set postTitle=#{postTitle}, postContent=#{postContent}, postUpdatedate=sysdate() where postNum=#{postNum}
update j_post set postHit=postHit+1 where postNum=#{postNum}
